english.segment1: Yes I'm living for today, When our dreams won't go away. And the promise that you gave. To see the earth resound with praise
english.segment2: And I believe it's time to change. And yes, I need your hand to break these chains
english.segment3: And love falls down on me. Love falls down on me
english.segment4: Yes, we're going all the way, Tomorrow's dreams are here today. I feel the joy beneath my feet. Will it be long before we meet?
english.segment5: And I believe my heart has found. All the good that comes from God above
english.segment6: And love falls down on me. Love falls down on me. And when heaven opens love will come. And will roll like a river, Yeah love falls down
